mapper.select: SELECT t1.dormentry_id, t1.dorm_id, t1.site_id, t1.sid, t1.status, t1.sort, t1.address, t1.address1, t1.address2,t1.address3, t1.notice, t1.dormentry_type, t1.dormentry_floors, t1.room_number, t1.student_number, t1.longitude, t1.latitude, t1.max_reward FROM 59_dormentry AS t1 INNER JOIN 59_dormentrydorm AS t2 ON t1.dormentry_id = t2.dormentry_id WHERE t2.dorm_id = #{dormId}

update 59_dormentry
dorm_id = #{dormId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},

address3 = #{address3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notice = #{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where dormentry_id = #{dormentryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
